definition.content:
Silverstripe CMS is an open-source platform for creating and managing websites and web applications. It offers an intuitive admin panel for easy content editing and customization without coding. Its flexible framework makes it ideal for both simple sites and complex projects.

This dashboard offers Silverstripe CMS content overview, providing insights into files, published files, pages, published pages along with failed login attempts information.

For more information, see the [Silverstripe CMS Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/silverstripe_cms/).

**Note**:
- The dashboard widgets display the most recent metric values captured for available content.

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
